item.description:
Saturday ~ December 1, 2012 ~ 7-10pm

JD West Acoustic ~ FREE SHOW

The Bull Run Restaurant
215 Great Road, Shirley, MA 01464
TEL: 877-536-7190 (Toll Free)
http://www.bullrunrestaurant.com

JD West is John Niemoller and Dwight Fronsdahl. They perform Acoustic Modern and Classic Rock with a twist of blues. They cover Dave Matthews, Tim Reynolds, John Mayer, Eric Clapton, Stevie Ray Vaughan,The Grateful Dead, The Allman Brothers, The Rolling Stones, and many more familiar Rock Artists.

Please "LIKE" and "FRIEND" JD West here:
http://www.facebook.com/pages/JD-West-Acoustic/220023321365079
http://www.myspace.com/jdwestacoustic
http://www.reverbnation.com/jdwestacoustic

JD West Acoustic is Presented by
Richard Axtman ~ Northern Music
northernmusic@yahoo.com
http://www.facebook.com/richard.axtmanii
http://www.myspace.com/northernmusicagency
item.name: Free JD West Acoustic Show at The Bull Run, Shirley, MA
